website_summaries.verdict: At 10 inches, this bar is shorter than others, but does not sacrifice magnetic strength.
pros: A very forceful magnet that holds three or four knives securely, making it a great option for small kitchens
We love the satin finish on the stainless steel
cons: Some owners report the magnet is so strong, it scratched their knife blades when removing utensils from the bar

customer_reviews.title: Good strong solution for knife storage problem.
customer_reviews.text: No complaint about the crooked / wobbly like I've seen other people post. We didn't have that problem. Just bear in mind that 10" is really, really short. Don't plan to put on more than 4-5 knives. We were constrained by space so it was our only option ... so we bought two and put one over the other. Also - if you stagger the handles like in the picture, you can cut your knuckles on one while reaching for the handle of the next one. Be sure to slide them all up to the handles to protect your fingers!
customer_reviews.author: patchworkalice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces and gives you back your counter.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, very strong, and got the knives out of those clunky blocks! I hung this inside a cabinet door over the counter - gained some much needed space since our over the stove microwave broke and we went for a counter-top model. 10" is small and I originally was going to insert it on a smaller door but then it was actually to big (couldn't close the door near the hinges). However, it fits six of our knives just fine
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Install is insanely easy. It’ll literally take you 5 minutes if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Install is insanely easy. It’ll literally take you 5 minutes if you have a hammer, drill, pencil, level and Phillips head screwdriver handy. Down side? The magnets are NOT that strong. Even hanging vertically from a horizontally installed magnet- your knives will have some sway to them. Trying to mount this vertically? Forget it. It won’t even support a Victorinox paring knife- which is LIGHT. The knife will simply fall straight down. So... mixed feelings here.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fraczek

customer_reviews.title: Knife storage for end of cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a handy spot for good knives that get hand washed and normally just piled into a drawer. I bought two of these for the end of my cabinets on both sides of my sink. These work well and encourage me to wash the knives immediately, hand dry them and stick them right onto these holders. There is only room for about 2 large and 2 small knives (I keep 2 chef's knives and 2 paring comfortably on one) but it keeps the ones I use often handy and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Skol!

customer_reviews.title: I have an investment in some really nice Kia/Shun knives and I didn't want them thrown in ...
customer_reviews.text: This has worked perfectly for my needs. I had very limited space so bought the 10" size which fit perfectly between a wall and a cupboard door. I have an investment in some really nice Kia/Shun knives and I didn't want them thrown in a drawer. I use this bar for 4 knives and a sharpening steel. They all stay in place very well, and look tidy hanging on the bar.
customer_reviews.author: VistadeiTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!! GET RID OF THAT UGLY BLOCK!
customer_reviews.text: DON'T KNOW HOW I LIVED WITHOUT THIS KNIFE RACK. MUCH BETTER THAN THAT UGLY BIG BLOCK ON THE COUNTER MOUNTED ON BACKSPLASH. EASY TO GET TO AND TO SEE WHICH KNIFE I WANT TO USE ALSO BOUGHT SMALLER ONE FOR STEAK KNIVES. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Alberta G.

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: It is much shorter than the pic implies, but I still love it. Great way to free up counter space in my tiny kitchen. I can fit 3 big knives (6-8" blades) and a couple of small ones too, though there is no room to spare. The magnet is strong, which is a good thing, but I am always very careful putting knives back on it. I always go slowly and carefully, mostly so as to not damage my expensive Shun knives, but I'm sure it keeps my fingers safer, too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Man, it's pretty.
customer_reviews.text: It's almost a shame to use this for shop tools, but that's what I bought it for. Grips sockets and small wrenches securely and releases them easily. Would look great in a kitchen with complementary fixtures or appliances.
customer_reviews.author: tinhorn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic knife bar was perfect for the small wall space available next to the oven and holds all the knives I normally use (and then some). It was really easy to install, though no instructions were included. The bar itself holds my knives very securely, but not so strongly that I would have to pry them off!
customer_reviews.author: TucsonTNR

customer_reviews.title: Who woulda known?!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea this would stick to my fridge, but what a pleasant surprise! Now I dont have to screw anything in! STRONG magnetic adhesion to the fridge AND to my knives!! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: katgurl217

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent hanging wall or shelf mount magnet for knives
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent hanging wall or shelf mount magnet for knives, and even small steel cookware. It is a strong magnet, I was able to hang a small pan w/o problem!! Could have been an inch or two longer, but hey. The surface is smooth as are the sides, drilled two small holes and screwed It in place. Laid the plane smooth face over the inside magnet and SNAP. There is hangs, holding 4 big knives.
customer_reviews.author: Slammer Tig

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am using this outside to hold a gate closed. The finish is still in good shape and the magnet is quite strong for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect size for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Really strong hold, perfect size for what I needed. I used to build a pull down knife rack that fits under my cabinets .
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I have a bread, chef's and three pairing knives and a tomato slicing knife on mine and could actually add two more small knives
customer_reviews.text: Tired of wooden blocks, wanted one that didn't take up to much wall space either. I have a bread, chef's and three pairing knives and a tomato slicing knife on mine and could actually add two more small knives if needed. Read other reviews about hanging it, I did and avoided any snapping they talked about., Sorry can't remember the details...
customer_reviews.author: Carol O.

customer_reviews.title: good, strong, but can scratch knives
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very very strong. It kind of scratched my knives but not terribly - just a little cosmetic damage so not a big deal. They're nice knives too, not from a cheapo knife block set or anything. That said, if I purchased a similar item again I'd go with a wood one to avoid scratching now that I know better.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!  holds knives well!
customer_reviews.text: The Endurance 18/8 stainless steel 10" bar fits perfectly on the side of a kitchen cabinet next to the stove. It is strong enough that it holds 5 knives -1 large chefs knife, 1- med chef knife, paring knife and 2 serrated utility knives (one of which is rather large).They do not hang crooked and they have not fallen off. I have read other reviews and I can not imagine what they are hanging or doing wrong. This serves the purpose and holds what I need basically on a daily basis at an arms reach without taking up any counter space. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: deb34285

customer_reviews.title: Nice space saver
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Easy install, just use a level. Pretty strong magnets and I have very heavy knives, However, magnet seems to be stronger in the middle so I store my heaviest knives there. I dry off the knives well before putting them up to prevent rust. I'd buy it again. UPDATE: I bought another, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my most commonly used knives
customer_reviews.text: I have several sets of knives and keep them in different places. I used this small bar on my stainless steel kitchen work-station. I mounted it by using heavy duty, double stick tape and it is mounted very securely. When I need a knife for a quick chop it is right there where I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Must have gadget for your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: As expected, Amazon sent the order in a jiffy and I got my husband to fix it the same day! It's smaller than I imagined, but serves my purpose well. It's a relief not having the sharp stuff lying around on the counter or the kitchen drawers where my small kids could find them. Very pleased with this bar and it also looks stylish as well as easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Neeta A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought one a few years ago and just added another. No complaints. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E. Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs at least one!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I ordered two and the price was simply amazing! They serve two very important purposes. One, they keep your blades sharp and your knives in perfect condition. If you have fine knives you don't want them ruined by blocks or tossed into drawrs.Two,; it's so much easier to just look up and see what I need while preparing a meal. It's a good brand, great price, awesome idea, you just can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect size for the space and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Washburn

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic strip that works!
customer_reviews.text: Product worked flawlessly. Was super easy to set up and the magnet easily holds up the four knives I have suspended. The smaller size was perfect to fit on our shallow cabinets. Regarding the description picture, I do have the knives facing down. There is a lip on the knife, where the handle begins, which gives support in keeping the knives on the magnet. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: NCHiker

customer_reviews.title: Super strong magnet!
customer_reviews.text: Super strong magnet, installed in minutes, perfect solution to free up kitchen counter space. Only piece of advice would be to use your own dry wall anchors that are sturdier and hold better. Had to remove the provided anchors right away and use my own. Still gave it 5 stars, would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Straughn

customer_reviews.title: So fantastic, I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to save counter space in our small kitchen. These bars enable us to use the side of the fridge for all our knives (and a pair of scissors). These strong magnetic bars hold tight to the side of the fridge without using any of the mounting materials. The knives hold firm but are easy to remove. The bars look great and function perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: EMF

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife rack
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife rack; it fits in the small space I have, and holds the 5 good knives that I own. Could probably fit one more. The magnet is very strong, so you don't worry about them slipping off. The stainless steel is very sleek and looks really nice in the kitchen. Clever the way it mounts and goes together so that there are no mounting screws that show.
customer_reviews.author: Happily Ever After

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnet, holds all except large chef's knife
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to the refrigerator and easily holds all knives with the exception of the large chef's knife, which was wobbly enough that I will not hang on this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Betty C.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife holder!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this magnetic strip. It fits in a small place and the magnet is extremely strong. We purchased two of them. One for each side.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Go for it. Great quality & stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and stylish, looks much more expensive than it is. Easy to install. Holds more than you'd expect, our big chef, utility and santoku fit well in addition to pairing, bread and boning knives and kitchen shears. The honing steel did not fit, but I also felt it was not as secure due to the rounded nature. Overall very happy with the purchase and uncluttered the counter as a traditional knife block requires a fair amount of space.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Quality. Strong magnet. A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Great! Can easily hang 4-5 large knives comfortably. I bought another one to hang quality measuring spoons and eventually matching measuring cups from. We are very pleased with these. Magnetic strength is strong and not wimpy. We are completely satisfied! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Drew and Bonnie Casner

customer_reviews.title: Nice strong magnetic, holds several knives in a small space
customer_reviews.text: Nice strong magnetic, holds several knives in a small space
customer_reviews.author: connie

customer_reviews.title: This magnetic bar looks nice but doesn't have a lot of sticking power
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic bar looks nice but doesn't have a lot of sticking power. My previous bar held knives much more securely. Nothing has fallen off yet but the knives feel loose and slightly touching them moves them around. I could not find any others this short and it's all the space I have so I will make do but I would not recommend this if you have another option.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My knifes stay put without any problems. Its mounted next to a cabinet door and I've never had a knife fall off. I like the idea that their always easily accessible and are up high enough that young one's can't get ahold of them. I fit about 6 knifes on it. Mostly large ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jon and Tish

customer_reviews.title: works great and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I got it installed on my kitchen wall in less than 5 min. I can fit two large chef's knives, one fillet knife, one paring knife, a bread knife and a zester on the strip.
customer_reviews.author: tommi

customer_reviews.title: I thought this magnetic strip was going to be a great solution for our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We have an extremely small kitchen and organization is key to sanity! I thought this magnetic strip was going to be a great solution for our kitchen, but it really exceeded our expectations. It is quite strong, easy to install and keeps all of our most used kitchen tools at the ready!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Magnet could be stronger, otherwise very happy.
customer_reviews.text: I mounted this unit vertically, and find that it could be magnetically stronger. Will not safely hold a 10" chef knife mounted perpendicularly, but will hold it when attached at a 45* angle to the surface. I'm very happy with both the design and the price, and am considering buying an additional unit to mount beside the first.
customer_reviews.author: MOsammy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Holds a surprising amount for its size. The screws it comes with are a little long for installing on the side of a cabinet, but i like it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Safe fun with knives
customer_reviews.text: I installed this knife (and scissors) holder on the side of a cabinet next to my sink. It's so convenient. I love to feel the knife pull away from me and snap as it comes within the strong magnetic field of the knife holder. All that fun and it holds knives, too. Be sure to measure your available space first.
customer_reviews.author: Ariadne Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I actually put this on a cabinet door; glued square metal pieces to my remotes and hung them on it!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: The magnet is super strong. If you're mounting on the side of ...
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is super strong. If you're mounting on the side of a cabinet make sure you get shorter screws
customer_reviews.author: C. Feilen

customer_reviews.title: this is a GREAT magnet set for knifes
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to free up counter space, this is a GREAT magnet set for knifes. I installed 2 of them in 5 minutes, and they hold the knifes like glue! Their stainless so you don’t have to worry about rust, just clean them like you would any other kitchen device.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Parks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kitchen to keep my chef knives. Looks great, works great. I didn't want to drill into my back splash so I actually used 2 command strips and it's holding up well, just have to push on it every once and a while to keep it stuck
customer_reviews.author: S G

customer_reviews.title: NEEDED FOR YEARS
customer_reviews.text: Use to have my go-to knives handy. So much better than leaving them on the counter or stowing in the big knife holder down the counter.
customer_reviews.author: DavE

customer_reviews.title: I use this for my bathroom nail tools and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my bathroom nail tools and it works perfectly. It is a very strong magnet for what I am using it for. I can't speak to how it would hold knives or tools.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Very good knife magnet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size magnetic block. I am using it for 8 japanese steel steak knives. Screws on to the surface. I had to attach to cabinet. Wish I had a way to attach to stone/granite backsplash without drilling
customer_reviews.author: 1GoodDog

customer_reviews.title: Functional addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Happy I found this. It is just the right length to fit on my kitchen cupboard. Most that I have seen are just about an inch too long. Nice to get some of my knives easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product currently hold three knives still Which is what I purchased it to do Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: andrew hower

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a number of these over the years. Usually when I move into a new place. They're affordable, look nice,and don't tarnish over time. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnet. I have it positioned so I can store knives and such HANDLE UP*** No danger of them slipping down and falling. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Eller

customer_reviews.title: This looks great and the magnet is crazy strong
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and the magnet is crazy strong. I had a tight space so wanted a shorter knife holder. This is perfect for that. Minimalist but classy look - all you see when installed is a piece of stainless - no seems, screws.
customer_reviews.author: R. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife Bar
customer_reviews.text: This magnet bar is clean-looking and easy to keep clean. It works very nicely in my recently remodeled kitchen and it has plenty of 'stick' for my largest knife.
customer_reviews.author: Alan E. Shrefler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnetic utensil storage!
customer_reviews.text: Low profile slick look and easy to install. I love these! They work great to declutter my kitchen counters and drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Julia C

customer_reviews.title: Installation was super easy! They give you all the hardware you ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want to store your knives and not worry about damaging the edge, this is for you! I have about 6 knives on my (2 chef and 4 smaller knives) and still have room left for a few others! Installation was super easy! They give you all the hardware you need. Took less than 5 mins of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D

customer_reviews.title: Good looking & functional
customer_reviews.text: Strong hold! A little tricky to install but all in all great product.
customer_reviews.author: natalia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and looks good. Taking it away from the wall is not too difficult if you remove it from one side. Putting it back you need to be a little careful as it can snap in quickly but that is due to the strong magnet.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent knife holder. Mounting optional.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even have to mount it. I just pulled the mounting plate off the bottom and stuck it to my refrigerator. Holds three knives just like in the picture perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Staylorme

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for a door in one of my bathroom cabinets to hang my scissors, tweezers, nail clippers etc. It was super easy to install--took me like minutes. Looks expensive and magnetic capability is quite strong.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: I'm completely satisfied with appearance as well as the effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnet, looks sharp (pun intended!). I mounted the 10" bar on the side of an upper cabinet and the 18" bar on a wall. Less clutter than having the knife block on the counter so use that space for other things. I'm completely satisfied with appearance as well as the effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: K F Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Smart design, best looking option on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This is the cleanest design I've found. It works great and does what it's supposed to. Instead of three magnets along the length like Ikea style knife bars, this one seems to be one giant flexible magnet inside a stainless steel casing. So there are no non-magnetic spots.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for More Than Kitchen Use
customer_reviews.text: I have two hanging in my sewing studio where I'm able to have scissors of various sizes, seam rippers, and other metal objects used in sewing at the ready!
customer_reviews.author: P.K. King

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite kitchen purchases ever! Keeps my knives right where I need them!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: We have it out up with command strips since our landlord doesn't want unnecessary screw holes in the wood
customer_reviews.text: I am totally loving this magnetic rack. We have it out up with command strips since our landlord doesn't want unnecessary screw holes in the wood. It is working just great. It's been up for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: Starry

customer_reviews.title: Best option for people who want to use it on their fridge
customer_reviews.text: I removed the rear plate and now i use it on my fridge w/o making any hole..Magnets are very strong to hold 5-6 knives securely..No rust of scratch problem at all..
customer_reviews.author: Erdem Demirkan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it it keeps my favorite knifes from knocking about in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, works well
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. Easy install, works well, takes up very limited space.
customer_reviews.author: ZAH

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, strong hold but returning due to safety concerns
customer_reviews.text: Only able to mount the product and fell off the wall in the middle of the night. Looks nice, strong hold but returning due to safety concerns.
customer_reviews.author: TNT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and works very well
customer_reviews.text: The wall cabinet next to the sink measured 10" deep between the trim so I ordered this knife bar as it matched my dimensions. It fit perfectly and has a strong pull to keep knives in place. It was easy to install and exceeded my every expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Super J

customer_reviews.title: Now easy to find stuff !
customer_reviews.text: Using in bathroom to clear up the clutter of all the small scissors and tweezers in the vanity
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small, minimalist magnetic knife rack
customer_reviews.text: We left our old knife magnet when we moved. This is a great, sleek, minimal knife holder that fits on the end of a cabinet next to our kitchen sink. Convenient, yet out of the way. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Smurfetita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great...I can fit 6 solid knives on this without fear of falling! So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Christine W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These work wonderfully. We have a lot of knives and this saves a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough to install vertically and hold my knives ...
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful enough to install vertically and hold my knives horizontal. They slide to end/bottom. That's why I purchased this and it failed me!
customer_reviews.author: KellnLA

customer_reviews.title: Great little piece!
customer_reviews.text: Now my knives are better protected and easy to reach.Very strong magnet. Easy to install. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mojo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Use this in the bathroom to hold all my clipper ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this in the bathroom to hold all my clipper, scissors, eye lash curler, tweezers.... helps to keep me organized.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Super strong magnet holds entire knife set securely. It got rid of that big, ugly wooden box on my countertop and no more guessing which knife I'm pulling out - Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, easy to install, strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the problem others have talked about (knives hanging at an angle). My knives hang just fine. Buyers should note the length of this magnet. It's quite short. Perfect for small spaces (as mine is), but it won't hold more than 6 or 7 knives.
customer_reviews.author: Good Behavior

customer_reviews.title: We like it.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to install. Strong enough to hold big, heavy knives. Looks interesting. Keeps knives off the counter or out of drawers, out of reach by little hands. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, Great to have knives very handy without getting dull my being in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: rog

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for the small amount of space that i had. I fit four knives, one large chefs knife and three different pairing knives, on this strong and sleak magnet. Installation was simple as could be!
customer_reviews.author: mclayton

customer_reviews.title: This product is so nice put my new knives on it and it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is so nice put my new knives on it and it looks so good in my kitchen. I would deathly recommend this for anyone who wants to make your kitchen looks great. Very easy to install
customer_reviews.author: rusty

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I was skeptical at first but the strength of the magnet is amazing. It adds a nice touch to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in a small space in our kitchen and holds 3 of our large knives and one smaller knife. It holds them well with a strong magnet and we have not had any issues with slippage.
customer_reviews.author: ariel tempest

customer_reviews.title: Nice Magnet
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about this. I put my expensive knives on it for easy access, and love how nice they look up there. Keeps my counters clear of any blocks, and makes them easier to reach nearer my stove.
customer_reviews.author: BecsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and strong magnet...great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was planning on mounting this inside the cabinet door, but it looked so good I put it on the wall above my counter. I left the knife shield on and they still stayed put..strong magnet!
customer_reviews.author: Susan D

customer_reviews.title: These are very strong and hold knivest very well. ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very strong and hold knivest very well. My only caveat is, if you have non stainless knives make sure they are dry before you put them on the blockb. Otherwise rust may form and stain the stainless.
customer_reviews.author: rsoroc

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: Not a very strong magnet imo, and way to shallow for me to grab the knives safely. Also when taking it down, could see the scratches etc. after about 2-3 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: bluebox

customer_reviews.title: Most Excellent Quality and Value!
customer_reviews.text: We are very, very happy with this item that we actually ordered a second one for our kitchen. Buy This Item Today!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Behm Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and is super easy to install. Feels sturdy and has no give at all. Magnets are strong and the knives hold effortlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Works awesome, I ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Easy instillation and flawless function.
customer_reviews.text: This holds so many items! Strong magnet, reliable and looks sleek mounted over our oven. Easy instillation and flawless function.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is sleek, nice looking, and functional. It is small enough to fit in a tight place, and looks nice because it is solid block metal.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Easy to mount
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnets. Looks great. Easy to mount. Could't find a consistent response as to the height of the strip so pic with tape measure included
customer_reviews.author: Harlwalt

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and sleek.
customer_reviews.text: ...plus they are shorter than most others offered. They were my only option for the space I had. But I would order these again even for a longer space I like them so well.

product_meta.title: RSVP International Endurance Stainless Steel Deluxe Magnetic Knife Bar, 10-inches | Satin Finish | Store Knives, Keys, Tools, Gadgets, Scissors, Supplies, and More | Safe and Secure, 10 inches
product_meta.description: Size:10 inchesThis RSVP magnetic Knife holder has a strong, full surface magnet that holds several items securely. The 18/8 stainless steel satin finish complements most kitchen styles for a sleek modern look and excellent storage capability to showcase your cutlery. Includes mounting hardware.
feature_bullets: DURABILITY: Made of 18/8 stainless steel with a sleek beautiful satin finish.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL: Hold knives, keys, tools, gadgets, scissors, supplies and more. A great storage solution and that can help keep spaces organized.
SECURE: Strong, full surface slip resistant magnet that holds items safely and securely without scratching.
FITS ANY ROOM SIZE: Convenient 10-inch length and hidden hardware fits any room size and the simple, yet elegant design works with most room decors.
EASY TO CLEAN: Simply wipe the surface clean with a dry or damp cloth.
